name: Kiplinger'sClosingBell
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Add Kiplinger to your Flash Briefing, and pay yourself first by putting Kiplinger's valuable insights at the top of your news by adjusting your Settings in the Alexa app. Manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
Say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to get our take on the latest stock-market activity.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
